column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As for the ramen
column2: our go-to option is the JINYA tonkotsu black. Very flavorful and delicious
column3: and the noodles are cooked to perfection! I always want to try some of the other options
column4: but this one is just so tasty that I inevitably end up coming back to it. Only complaint is that the ramen is a bit oily. After you're done eating
column5: if you still have soup left
column6: you can see the layer of oil forming at the top. Not as bad as some other places
column7: but I would prefer if they used maybe just half the amount of oil.
